titleStmt.title: A description of loue With certaine epigrams. Elegies. and sonnets. And also Mast. Iohnsons answere to Master Withers. With the crie of Ludgate, and the song of the begger.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637, attributed name.
Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Francis Coules at the vpper end of the Old-Baily neere Newgate,

notesStmt.note: The answer is variously attributed to Ben Jonson or to Richard Johnson.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the vpper end of the Old-Baily neere Newgate
